summary.span: 將 物件的集合封裝在 中。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這用來管理中的映像以程式設計的方式，提供方法來新增和移除映像物件。This is used to manage the images in the programmatically, providing methods to add and remove image objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何選取、 移除和顯示映像，從的屬性類別，這是型別。The following code example shows how to select, remove, and display images, from the property of the class, which is an type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換成之前它會新增至清單。The is converted to a before it is added to the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構，將影像加入至屬性，並將屬性，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它放在表單，其中包含一個按鈕名為`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form that contains a button named `Button1`. 此範例假設在 c:\Windows FeatherTexture.bmp 和進入 Fishing.bmp 的存在\\。The example assumes the existence of FeatherTexture.bmp and Gone Fishing.bmp at c:\Windows\\. 如果點陣圖不存在於您的系統上，或存在於另一個位置，請據此變更的範例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system or exist at another location. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫，最後傳回會檢查索引鍵相符的項目第一次，而且如果沒有相符項目，搜尋會從集合的開頭。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 映像的名稱會對應至它的索引鍵中。The name of an image corresponds to its key in the . 索引鍵的比較不區分大小寫。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`參數是`null`或空字串，方法會傳回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, the method returns -1.
